ygData.subject: RE: Re: Lots o Wizard groups
ygData.msgSnippet: You are right, this argument/discussion is one of those that have no end. But... to add my 2 cents hehe... If I am ever group leader and catch a bard pulling
ygData.messageBody:
You are right, this argument/discussion is one of those that have no end.

But... to add my 2 cents hehe... If I am ever group leader and catch a bard
pulling with an area effect song in a place like Unrest or Mistmoore, that
bard will be soloing when he gets back from zoning the train. The best
puller, bar none, is the guy/gal who knows the strengths and weaknesses of
his/her class to a "T". I have grouped with paladins who liked to pull (that
was an interesting evening in Solusek) Rangers, Druids, Monks, even a wizzy.
Different situations call for different types of pullers. I regularly group
with an enchanter who loves to pull, and boy is she good at it, providing
she is not pulling long distances. Indoor or out, she is great. I pull when
fighting Aviaks for Safe Fall reasons. My ranger friends in Mistmoore and
Cazic for harmony reasons. Each situation requires something different of
the puller, and those that know there class inside and out, and know the
area you are hunting in, are better than those that don't.

Praelor Dileasai

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Dan Gilbert [SMTP:sykotic@...]
> Sent: Friday, October 08, 1999 5:16 PM
> To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Re: Lots o Wizard groups
>
> At 04:08 PM 10/8/99 -0700, you wrote:
>
>
> I guess this argument could go on forever but it looks to me like
> your talking about outdoor zones specifically. How can I dispute somthing
> that I have never seen? I cant. Becasue I have never seen a bard as the
> puller. Mind if I ask what level all those songs are?
>
>
>
> The highest of the songs is Level 15. By the time they really
> start using them in the Mid 20s and up they should be really effective.
> True, Accelerando only works outdoors, but the other 2 spells work indoors
> and they are what is used to pull anyways. Accelerando is only for hauling
> ass back to the party or the zone.
>
>
>
>
